attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban the sale of all American literature detailing how to make homemade firearms & accessories. Firearms are legal to own in America & therefore more relevent there. As it is illeagal to own these items in the UK, why should it be leagal to buy books that describe how to make them at home?

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for action, for example beginning with a verb, rather than a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
